Hero - Class in com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.movingelements
A Hero is an element that is controllable by the player.
It extends MovingObject.
Hero can shoot Projectile, shield from attacks, trigger a special attack and collect Fruit for points.
Hero(InteractableWorld, int, int) - Constructor for class com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.movingelements.Hero
Constructor that takes unit column and rows to initialize the normal hero

HeroController - Class in com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.world
This class is used to deal with the key inputs bind from GameRefresher to control the Hero in WorldElements.
Demonstrates Single Responsibility.
